name: Candyman: Be My Victim (DEMAKE)
description:
This was my return to slasher games in 2006. It was only a demo on the PC, but now a complete game for the NES! Play as Candyman & eviscerate anyone that dares to say your name 5 times in front of a mirror.

This was originally made in Click & Create and then ported to play on an NES.

For more information on the original windows game, visit the official page here.

Alternate download link here.

{PC Demo released: June 10, 2006. NES demake released: February 1, 2023.}

-=List of easter eggs and codes=-

  • On the credits screen.. Press the select button 14 times to jump to the Final Bonus Level instantly.
  • On the second level after you kill the girl that tries to step on your mirror, go left to the next room. In that room hold right + select to see a tribute to Dimebag Darrell. 
  • During the "Fista Productions" logo at the beginning.. Do the button combination down, up, left, left, A, right, down before it changes to the title screen for a secret surprise (the combination is a reference to the DULLARD code from the Sega Genesis port of Mortal Kombat).

-=Extras=-

  • YouTube Playlist of videos about this game. 
  • Speed run page. (link coming soon)
  • Retro Achievements page.
